column4: Hello all. I've just recently upgraded to Ubuntu 8.10 and also installed the kubuntu-desktop packages. At the end of the installation it asked me which display manager I want to use and I selected kdm. After restarting, I logged back on to my Gnome session, but since then, the component with my name and log off/shutdown options on the top right-hand corner has disappeared. Any ideas?
yeah, kdm is kde and gdm is gnome
try adding it to the panel
adding it to the panel? from where?
